sponsors.name: Murex

company.name: Murex
company.designation: A global fintech / capital markets software company

sponsors.bio: A global fintech / capital markets software company. Their platform MX.3 supports trading, risk, treasury and post-trade operations used by banks and financial institutions around the world.

sponsors.name: Speedlane
sponsors.bio: We are a top-shelf product development shop specializing in implementation excellence. Our mission is to deliver premium digital services that help forward-thinking clients change the world. We believe technology should boost human potential. We build solutions that work beautifully today and scale seamlessly as clients grow.

sponsors.name: Monty Holding
sponsors.bio: Founded in 1998 by visionary entrepreneur Mountasser Hachem, Monty Holding has rapidly evolved into a global powerhouse, reshaping industries and exceeding expectations. From our UK headquarters, we're not just delivering solutions but we're architecting the future for our clients and partners.
sponsors.description: Founded in 1998 by visionary entrepreneur Mountasser Hachem, Monty Holding has rapidly evolved into a global powerhouse, reshaping industries and exceeding expectations. sponsors.name: KDD
sponsors.bio: KDD was founded in 1962 as a dairy company with a vision to achieve nutritional goals through packaged dairy food for the local market. Operating from its first plant in the Shuwaikh area in Kuwait, KDD began producing milk and yoghurt. Over the years, KDD grew and diversified its portfolio. Today, it has a multi-product, multi-category portfolio that caters to a wide variety of consumers in the region.
sponsors.description: KDD was founded in 1962 as a dairy company with a vision to achieve nutritional goals through packaged dairy food for the local market. sponsors.name: LAU, Software Institue
sponsors.bio: The Software Institute at LAU, part of the School of Arts and Sciences, serves as a hub for innovation, education, and technological advancement, where passion and expertise come together for developers and tech enthusiasts to learn, collaborate, and thrive.
